    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.860

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:14.860
    | text      = We are going to be talking about the rallies that happened in DC over the weekend.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.059
    | text      = Yeah, they went great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:18.059
    | text      = Now, one thing that's really difficult for me is I'm not going to be addressing, really,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:23.220
    | text      = the street violence.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.860
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:25.860
    | text      = And I think that that is a failing of our show to an extent, and that is because I don't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:29.299
    | text      = have enough time to get into it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:32.340
    | text      = Not on our show, I mean in terms of, like, cover it with the seriousness and the focus
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:38.899
    | text      = that I think the topic deserves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.740
    | text      = Sure, we're a silly show about Alex Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.899
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:43.899
    | text      = I don't want to give short shrift to that, but at the same time, it falls slightly outside
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.440
    | text      = of what I have the time to cover.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:52.740
    | text      = As we've seen with Rogan, half-assing it is sometimes worse than doing anything at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.500

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:01.139
    | text      = or tacitly accept such, such.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:06.799
    | text      = So Jordan, on Saturday, there were multiple rallies that were happening in DC, surrounding
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:11.700

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.460
    | text      = Stop that steal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:15.460
    | text      = You know what I'm saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:16.460
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:17.460
    | text      = They were both about the same thing, had the same theme, and even featured some overlapping
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:20.460
    | text      = speakers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:21.460
    | text      = It was super confusing, but I think I know what was up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.860
    | text      = One of the rallies was being held by the Women for America First, the group that formed out
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:28.700
    | text      = of the Tea Party, which is trying to use these protests and some of this unrest to secure
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.100
    | text      = more power for the Republican Party, while simultaneously trying to make the Republican
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:37.220
    | text      = Party as weird as possible, like they did with the Tea Party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:40.179
    | text      = Yes, correct.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:41.179

}}

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:50.779
    | text      = Well, if I remember my story of Jericho well, I believe those people were the nice ones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.019
    | text      = They decided to end the siege by negotiating, coming to a fair solution for both parties,
}}

    | text      = right?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:05.620

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.620
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:07.620
    | text      = That Jericho March had Ali Alexander in the mix, a friend from Infowars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:11.299
    | text      = They also had the Cowboys for Trump, and noted asshole slash Congress member Paul Gosar.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.860
    | text      = It's really hard for me to tell what exactly was going on, and I kind of don't think that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.399
    | text      = these two were opposing rallies per se.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.559
    | text      = Your instinct would be to think that the Jericho March was for the religious zealots, whereas
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:28.059
    | text      = the Women for America First would be the more restrained one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:32.120
    | text      = But honestly, the rallies were almost identical.
